articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Muhammad Morsi, president of Egypt, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the July 23 revolution, the national holiday of Egypt.
					 Kim in the message said that the revolution was a historic event that brought about an epochal turn in all fields including society, economy and culture of Egypt.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow in the future, too, the message wished the Egyptian people greater progress, prosperity and wellbeing.

articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian PM
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Sunday sent a message of greeting to Kamal El Ganzouri, prime minister of Egypt, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the July 23 revolution in Egypt.
					 The message wished him greater success in his work to achieve the security of the country and its economic development.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Egyptian counterpart Mohamed Kamel Amr.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lee Myung Bak Regime Is Bound to Meet Merciless Punishment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lee Myung Bak Regime Is Bound to Meet Merciless Punishment
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors indiscriminately infiltrate defectors to the south Korea into the DPRK being assigned the duty of demolishing statues of peerlessly great men and monuments.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should be wiped out as it has gone desperate in its efforts to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This is necessary to defend the dignity and destiny of the nation and achieve the peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The incident was the hideous politically-motivated terrorism that was back-stage manipulated by the U.S.
					
					 But this useless daydream only proved the U.S. and the south Korean regime's vulnerability and total bankruptcy of their policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Any "internal act" and "contingency" can never happen in the DPRK. This was just heinous sabotage and subversion acts planned by the south Korean regime to undermine the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 We should never pardon but mercilessly wipe out the Lee Myung Bak regime who dared to try to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 As the arrested criminal said, the regime would continue to conduct sabotage and subversion acts aimed at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK replete with the spirit of annihilating the enemy have leveled their powerful striking means at the provocation bases of the Lee regime, and are waiting for an order.
					
					 All the patriotic Koreans at home and abroad should turn out in a nation-wide sacred war to wipe out the enemies of the nation and build a prosperous and reunified powerful nation on this land.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun U.S. Will Suffer Disastrous Defeat If It Provokes War in Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun U.S. Will Suffer Disastrous Defeat If It Provokes War in Korea
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- July 27, 1953 was a tragic day for the U.S. It suffered the bitterest defeat in its history and was put to shame that day though it invaded the young DPRK while boasting of its myth of "mightiness".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. boasted of having won only victories in all battles including the world war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists hurled into the Korean War one third of their army, one fifth of their air force and most of battleships belonging to the Pacific Fleet and over 2 million troops including those of their 15 satellite nations and south Korean puppet army as well as a great deal of the latest military hardware.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists had no idea about the immense strength of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who rose as one under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung decisively beat back the armed invasion by the U.S. imperialists to win a historic victory in the three-year long war.
					
					 The myth of the U.S. "mightiness" was shattered to pieces by its defeat in the war.
					
					 The world got to know well through the war that the U.S. much-touted "mightiness" was just nonsense.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have staged military provocations and war drills for aggression even after the war ended in a truce.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have reliably defended the security of socialist country and the revolutionary gains under the leadership of the great party.
					
					 The U.S., however, is still resorting to the high-handed policy toward the DPRK, crying out that strength is almighty.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists unleash another war in Korea, trumpeting the strength-almighty theory, being oblivious of the historical lesson in the 1950s, they will meet more shameful, bitter defeat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japan's Reinvasion Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japan's Reinvasion Moves
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries seek to realize their ambition for reinvasion of Korea backed by the U.S. and, furthermore, pave the way for expansion overseas, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 Serious is that the Japanese militarist forces go far ahead of a war chariot being driven by the U.S., the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Japan is showing ill-boding military moves. Its moves to become a military giant and launch reinvasion are evidenced by consent to arms export, nuclear weaponization, attempted conclusion of the General Security of Military Information Agreement with south Korean regime and exercise of right to collective self-defence.
					
					 Principle of peace which Japan put up depicting itself as a "pacifist state" after its defeat in war has already gone bankrupt.
					
					  Its stepped-up attempt to exercise the right to collective self-defence should not be overlooked, either, as it is pursuant to the U.S. plan.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that Japanese ultra-right politicians call for changing "Self-defence Forces" to defence army.
					
					 Japan is going to spark off a war in Northeast Asia together with the U.S. This is proved by the recent joint military exercises by the U.S., Japan and south Korea in waters off the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Peace-loving countries and people in Asia and the rest of the world should heighten vigilance against Japan's dangerous reinvasion moves. They should clearly know that the Japanese militarists will always join the U.S. in its fighting. Stand-off with U.S. precisely means the one with Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Regime of Evading Blame for Terrorist Case
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Regime of Evading Blame for Terrorist Case
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is employing a sleight of hand to pretend ignorance of hideous terrorist act against the DPRK. This is no more than an absurd artifice to mislead the public at home and abroad and evade the responsibility for the case. This is also another vicious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 Lee's guilty conscience can be felt in such words that "it is north's unilateral smear campaign" and "it is something impossible" let loose by the south Korean puppet regime, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Through the rhetoric the regime tried to convince the public that the recent terrorist case was planned by an individual wicked NGO. It is nonsensical to assert that such a huge case was designed without interference of the "government" authorities.
					
					 A stupendous amount of money was said to have been spent to purchase ultra-modern weapon for terrorism. It is clear that those who hardly make a living can not afford it.
					
					 The puppet regime let Kim Song Min, representative of "Front for Liberation of North Korean People", do acting, an awkward and clumsy gesture.
					
					 All witnesses, material evidence and testimonies made by the conspirator indict the U.S. and Lee regime for the hideous sabotage and subversion acts, a product of the master and its stooge and unprecedented terrorism against a country. With nothing can the regime negate this.
					
					 Those who were involved in the hideous subversion acts and sabotage against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK with the U.S. direct involvement and command are die-hard plot-breeders and tricksters who would stoop to any infamy to hurt the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Such shocking cases as Yonphyong Island shelling and Cheonan warship sinking occurred in succession after Lee Myung Bak came to power, creating a touch-and-go situation. This threatened the destiny of the Korean nation and the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The recent anti-DPRK terrorism planned by the Lee regime proved who was behind the unresolved cases, which the public at home and abroad is still skeptical about.
					
					 Nothing will be surprising even if catastrophic incident happens on the Korean Peninsula now.
					
					 What remains to be done by the DPRK is to settle accounts with provokers of the Lee regime as it already made an open declaration of war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lee Myung Bak's Hysterical Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lee Myung Bak's Hysterical Remarks under Fire 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, putting his salary as a donation into the "unification jar" created by the Ministry of Unification, talked nonsense that unification is, indeed, near at hand and judging from everything unification is in sight like one can know the sunset through the glow.
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary on Sunday brands the remarks made by Lee as hysterical.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have plunged into a total collapse and the touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the Lee Myung Bak herds of traitors who are going reckless to perpetrate such unimaginable provocations as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, and do harm to the compatriots in the DPRK in collaboration with outsiders.
					
					 Even at this moment war drills are under way targeting the compatriots.
					
					 Spreading the rumor of the "strike through office window", the south Korean regime begged its American master to extend the range of missiles and even made no scruple of introducing mine-sweeping equipment to open the routes to invade the DPRK.
					
					 Not content with it, the regime is making desperate efforts to conclude a pro-Japanese agreement for confrontation with fellow countrymen to draw Japan into a war against the DPRK while tightening the military tie-ups with the Japanese reactionaries, sworn-enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					 Traitor Lee said that unification is, indeed, near at hand. This remark clearly shows his ugly nature of judging everything in an upside-down way and making wrong analysis of everything.
					
					 His confrontation nature will remain unchanged. That is why it is a pressing matter to eliminate confrontation maniac Lee who is absolutely harmful to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Woman Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Woman Centenarian 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to woman centenarian Kim Kwan Ok residing in the 17th neighborhood unit of Sansung-ri, Unryul County of South Hwanghae Province.
					 She was born in the countryside of Unryul County before the liberation of the country. It was only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a genuine and happy life, tilling land given to her.
					
					 She worked hard as a farmer with the intention to live up to the benevolence of the country. She did not stop working even though she became retired.
					
					 She likes boiled rice and other cereals, bean food and vegetables.  She is optimistic and in good health under the socialist health care system. 
					
					 She also does the cooking and needlework and grows vegetables in the garden.

articles.title: Provincial Meetings Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Provincial Meetings Congratulate Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in North Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Kangwon Provinces and Nampho City on Sunday to extend congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, working people and youth and students.
					
					 Read out there was a decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings on behalf of people of different social strata.
					
					 They said that the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un was a token of absolute trust and loyalty of the army and people for him who works hard to bring earlier the prosperity of the country. 
					
					 Under the original Songun leadership of the supreme commander, a heyday of strengthening the revolutionary armed forces is being provided and the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity and might as a military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state that no enemy dare provoke, they said. It was also thanks to the Songun politics that a solid foundation of building an economic power is being laid.
					
					 Through their life experiences, they cherished the truth that only when they follow Kim Jong Un, can they have glorious today and tomorrow, emerge victorious and enjoy a genuine, worthwhile life, they noted. 
					
					 They called upon all the party members and other people to get united around him with single mind and uphold his idea and leadership with pure conscience and revolutionary obligation.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Determined to Punish S. Korean Regime for Heinous Terrorism
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Determined to Punish S. Korean Regime for Heinous Terrorism
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held here Thursday, with a defector to south Korea disclosing the anti-DPRK terrorism attempted by the south Korean regime.
					 The disclosure has touched off resentment among the servicepersons.
					
					 Choe Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "We will never pardon the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea that orchestrated the operation to demolish statues of the peerlessly great men.
					
					Rat-like Lee is going wild to do harm to the great persons the entire Korean nation have revered as the Sun.
					
					 Now is the time to promptly execute Lee, a filth and disgrace to the nation.
					
					The men and officers of our unit are on alertness to reduce to ashes Chongwadae and the Intelligence Service of south Korea."
					
					Kim Ung Chol, an officer of the KPA Strategic Rocket Forces, said:
					
					"Chongwadae and all other dens of human dregs are our targets of attack. They will be destroyed in an instant, once an order of firing is issued."
					
					 Jong Sin Hyok, an officer of the same forces, said:
					
					 "Rat-like Myung Bak is bound to face a harsh punishment by the entire nation for having egged on the anti-DPRK bodies in south Korea, including the 'statue demolition society', to conduct terrorism.
					
					 It is so ridiculous for the south Korean regime to try to offend the DPRK where all the people are united in one mind, by instigating such human dregs.
					
					 Nothing can break the single-minded unity of our army and people who are ready to become human bombs in safeguarding their supreme leadership."

articles.title: DPRK People Ready to Stage Just War on Terrorism
articles.content:
DPRK People Ready to Stage Just War on Terrorism
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now lashing out at the United States and the south Korean regime for their politically-motivated terrorist acts.
					 Recently Jon Yong Chol, a defector from the north of Korea to the south, told home and foreign reporters here that the U.S. and the south Korean regime have engineered terrorism aimed to destroy statues and monuments, holy places of the DPRK, through formation of such anti-DPRK bodies as the "statue demolition society".  Jon was arrested in the DPRK while attempting to conduct such terrorist act.
					
					  In this regard, Kim Kyong Bin, an official of Taedonggang Hotel, told KCNA:
					
					 "I can hardly repress my towering anger at this fact.
					
					 Through this case, the U.S. fully revealed itself as the kingpin of terrorism because it orchestrated and financed such terrorist acts aimed at the supreme leadership of a sovereign state, while calling for "anti-terrorism war".
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors persist in such hostile policy toward the DPRK, its servicepersons and civilians will launch a just war on terrorism to wipe out the sources of all evils."
					
					 Ri Myong Hui, head of a workshop of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, said:
					
					 "It is high time that we annihilated the Lee Myung Bak clan of rats committing hideous crimes.
					
					 The attempted terrorism is no more than last-ditch effort of the lunatic. The Lee group of traitors can never cover up the rays of the sun, no matter how desperately they try in collusion with the U.S."
					
					 Jong Hwa Suk, a saleswoman of Pyongyang Department Store No.1, said:
					
					 "The recently attempted terrorism by the U.S. and the south Korean regime is little different from a declaration of war on the DPRK.
					
					 They will face a stern punishment of history for having schemed to conduct sabotage against the DPRK by using even internationally-banned weapons."

articles.title: Friendly Football Matches between DPRK, China
articles.content:
Friendly Football Matches between DPRK, China
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- U-16 friendly football matches between the DPRK and China took place in Pyongyang on Friday and Sunday.
					 The Chinese team won the first match and the second match ended with draw.
					
					 Both teams are to participate in the 2012 Asian U-16 Soccer Championship, which will be held in Iran two months later.
					
					 In group C league matches, the DPRK team will play with south Korea on Sept. 23, Saudi Arabia on the 25th  and Japan on the 27th.
					
					 The Chinese team belongs to group D.
					
					 The DPRK took the title in the 2010 Asian U-16 Soccer Championship.

articles.title: Japan's Attempt to Cover up Crime-Woven History Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Attempt to Cover Up Crime-Woven History Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Members of "Way to Reunification", a pro-reunification movement of south Korea, and parents of Late Spring Mun Ik Hwan School and citizens held the 1031st  Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on July 18. They demanded a solution to the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					 The participants in their statement denounced Japan for its attempt to cover up its crime-woven history.
					
					 Noting that it is impossible to eclipse the sun with a palm, they urged the Japanese government to clarify their official stand.
					
					 Victims to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army are still suffering from it, they said, adding Japan should repent of the criminal acts it committed in the past.

articles.title: Korean Businessmen in China Condemn Anti-DPRK Actions of U.S. and S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
Korean Businessmen in China Condemn Anti-DPRK Actions of U.S. and S. Korean Regime 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Korean Economists Association in China released a statement under the caption "U.S. and wicked south Korean puppet clan of traitors, do not go reckless" on July 17.
					 The statement said that shortly ago, people who infiltrated the DPRK to blow up a statue and grand monument in it at the instructions of the U.S. and the south Korean intelligence agency were detected and arrested.
					
					 This clearly shows that the sabotage acts against the DPRK has reached the most frantic stage, it said.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is keen on the move to lure and abduct residents of the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. in order to use them for the smear campaign against the DPRK, it noted. They even infiltrate vicious defectors to south Korea and traitors into the DPRK to have the sabotage acts executed, it added.
					
					 The recently-unmasked criminal plot is part of the most hideous provocations to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as well as an extremely frantic confrontation racket, it said, adding:
					
					 We, the association and Korean businessmen in China, will wage unflinching struggle to wipe out the group of rat-like Lee going reckless to exterminate all the compatriots in the DPRK with the backing of foreign forces.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Suk I, Korean in the U.S., published an article on July 11 in denunciation of Lee Myung Bak, a traitor of south Korea who has gone desperate in his pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts.
					 The article said:
					
					 Lee has done nothing good for the nation and the people during his office. 
					
					 He approved the import of the U.S. beef infected with mad cow disease, threatening the health of the people, and concluded the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S. and pushed for four big river projects. He also tried to put the media under control and was involved in land speculation and brutally cracked down upon evacuees in Ryongsan and workers of Ssangryong Motors who demanded the right to existence.
					
					 To serve the interests of the U.S. and Japan, Lee totally denied the north-south joint declarations, offered a large amount of money collected from the people as taxes to outside forces and has sought to conclude a military agreement with the sworn enemy of the nation, not content with deploying aggression weapons. 
					
					 Lee who holds the seat of power in Chongwadae of south Korea is just like a governor of a state of the U.S. and a faithful dog of Japan. Traitor Lee works hard to meet the interests of the U.S. and does not consider it as shameful to serve Japan.
					
					 The reason why many countries of the world respect the DPRK is that it exercises and defends the sovereignty and dignity of the nation, a sharp contrast to south Korea which submits to imperialism.
					
					 The article urged Lee Myung Bak to stop acting as a slave for the U.S. and Japan but take the road of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for the reunification of the country, desire of the nation.

articles.title: Russian Air Space Defence Forces Hold Drill
articles.content:
Russian Air Space Defence Forces Hold Drill
 Moscow, July 21 (KCNA) -- Russia started a drill of the air space defence forces in Astrakhan Region on July 19.
					 Involved in the drill are the headquarters of the anti-aircraft brigade in charge of air defence above Moscow and the industrial zone in the central Russia, anti-aircraft missile regiments, about 800 troops of radio technology sub-units and at least 100 pieces of combat technical hardware.
					
					 The two-stage drill is aimed to help the soldiers train the ability of annihilating ballistic and other targets flying in high and low altitudes with C-300, C-400 and other missile complexes. 
					
					 This was clarified by a spokesman for the air space defence forces of Russia.

articles.title: Russia Steps up Arms Build-up
articles.content:
Russia Steps Up Arms Buildup 
 Moscow, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Russian defense ministry plans to create 26 brigades in the army.
					 10 scout brigades, 14 air brigades belonging to the ground forces and 2 antiaircraft missile brigades will reportedly be organized and deployed under 2020 arms buildup plan.

articles.title: Iran Majlis Speaker Raps U.S. Double-Standards
articles.content:
Iran Majlis Speaker Raps U.S. Double-Standards 
 Tehran, July 21 (KCNA) -- Iran's Majlis Speaker Ali Larijani bitterly condemned the double-standards of the West on terrorism at a rally on July 19.
					 He noted that Western countries calling for combating terrorism keep mum about the terrorism committed in other countries, and even hatch terrorist plan from the backstage.
					
					 He urged the West to abandon the double-standards in the terror issue.

articles.title: CPI-M Wants Prosecution of U.S. Navy over Killing of Indian Fisherman
articles.content:
CPI-M Condemns U.S. Navy over Killing of Indian Fisherman 
 New Delhi, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of India (Marxist) (CPI-M) wanted prosecution of the U.S. Naval personnel involved in killing of one Indian fisherman and injury to three others in firing from an American naval ship off Dubai coast on Monday.
					 Branding it as a planned murder, CPI-M demanded that "the U.S. naval personnel who committed this act of murder be arrested and put on trial".

articles.title: U.S. Builds Missile Defense Radar Site in Qatar
articles.content:
U.S. Builds Missile Defense Radar Site in Qatar 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- U.S. Defense Department is building a missile defense radar station in Qatar, and the construction was due to be completed this month, U.S. media reported on Tuesday. 
					 According to a report on the website of the Wall Street Journal on July 17, the radar site is part of a system designed to defend U.S. interests and allies such as Israel and European countries against Iran's arsenal of ballistic missiles. The radar base in Qatar is slated to house an AN/TPY-2 radar, supplementing two similar arrays already in place in Israel's Negev Desert and in central Turkey.

articles.title: Submarine Hawaii of U.S. Navy Enters S. Korean Port
articles.content:
Submarine Hawaii of U.S. Navy Enters S. Korean Port
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Hawaii, a U.S. nuclear-powered submarine, entered a port in Pusan which houses the south Korean navy operation command on July 20, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Hawaii, fitted with all sorts of weaponry including Tomahawk missiles, took part in war drills in the operational theatre of the U.S. 7th Fleet before the entry, the second one this month.
					
					 George Washington, a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier, and 3 warships belonging to its flotilla also entered the Pusan port on June 27 after wrapping up the large-scale joint naval drills in the West Sea of Korea aimed at strike at the DPRK.
					
					 Recently the U.S. imperialists have remarkably massed the latest military hardware in south Korea and often hurled nuclear strike means into it, more openly revealing their attempt to unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Prosecution, Judicial Officials Condemn U.S., S. Korean Regime for Hideous Crimes
articles.content:
Prosecution, Judicial Officials Condemn U.S., S. Korean Regime for Hideous Crimes
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Judicial and prosecution officials are becoming increasingly vocal in condemning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime for their vicious act upon hearing the confession made by a conspirator who was engaged in hideous sabotage and subversion acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					 Ri Nyon Yong, department director of the Supreme Court, said that sordid plot of enemies amounts to grave state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and rat-like Lee Myung Bak group are working hard to commit even politically-motivated terrorism with sinister aims to break the single-minded unity and topple the socialist system in the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. wire-pulled the group of rats.
					
					 The recently disclosed plot clearly proved that the U.S. is an undisguised violator of the rights of a sovereign state and arch criminal of state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 How can such human scum and wicked criminals be allowed to go unpunished?
					
					 The plot is just the tip of iceberg, said Kim Myong Bok, judge of the Supreme Court, in the strong terms.
					
					 The enemies' moves to blow up a statue of the peerless great man are the most undisguised insult and physical attack on the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 These moves amount to the war action little different from invasion of a sovereign state. 
					
					 Who spies out state information is liable for criminal responsibility.
					
					 Never to be pardoned is the act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which the Korean people regard as dearer than their lives.
					
					 Such terrorism can never be overlooked.
					
					 Very high price should be paid for it.
					
					 Kim Jun Gol, department director of the Court, said as follows hardly repressing resentment against plotters of vicious and outrageous state-sponsored sabotage act against the DPRK:
					
					 We can never forgive the U.S. imperialists and the puppet regime for working out and pushing ahead with the indelible traitorous crime.
					
					 We will sentence them to capital punishment.

articles.title: Foreign Media Reports about Interview with Terrorist Conspirator in DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report about Press Conference with Terrorist Conspirator in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported on July 19 and 20 a press conference with Jon Yong Chol who was arrested for being engaged in hideous terrorist act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK at the instructions of the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime.
					 ITAR-TASS of Russia said that Jon Yong Chol, defector to south Korea, admitted his treason at the press conference by local and foreign reporters on July 19.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He said he agreed to perpetrate such a hideous crime of blowing up a statue of President Kim Il Sung in a border city in the DPRK in a bid to destabilize the public in return for the reward he got from a south Korean intelligence agency in Seoul.
					
					 He crossed the border at night on June 18 to infiltrate into the border city. He was arrested by security men of the DPRK while going back toward the border.
					
					 He said south Korean intelligence agencies and the U.S. are involved in the secret operation and a special group was organized for its execution.
					
					 The statue was to be blown up by use of a powerful explosive device which can be operated by a remote-controller, he added.
					
					 He confirmed the security of the secret border route on May 13, he noted, confessing that the day of "undertaking" was scheduled to be on July 27, anniversary of the victory in war.
					
					 UPI, the New York Times of the U.S. and Jiji of Japan also reported the press conference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was carried by the Nepalese paper Review Nepal on July 17.
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. It also sets forth tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on their basis.

articles.title: Foreign Media Introduce Korean People's Socialist Cause
articles.content:
Foreign Media Introduce Korean People's Socialist Cause
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Russian paper Nidjegorodskaya Pravda on July 5 carried several articles under the head title "Kim Il Sung: son of the people, father of the nation", introducing in detail his patriotic revolutionary family.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on July 8 carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, iron-willed commander".
					
					 It praised the President as an iron-willed commander who liberated Korea through the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and inflicted the bitterest defeat in history on the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the 1950-1953 Korean war.
					
					 The 7th issue of the German paper Rote Fahne said in an article titled the "DPRK carries forward the cause of Comrade Kim Il Sung" that Kim Il Sung is the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					 After the President passed away, general secretary Kim Jong Il defended socialist Korea in the most difficult period and brought a decisive turn in the building of a thriving nation, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un has successfully carried forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He declared that he would carry to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche without the slightest deviation and concession.
					
					 The Korean people will surely inherit and accomplish their socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by World: French Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by World: French Organization
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted on its Internet homepage an article praising President Kim Il Sung on July 8, the 18th anniversary of his demise. It was illustrated with a photo of him receiving Wilfred Burchett, former writer and journalist of Australia.
					 The article said:
					
					 The President received many foreign figures in his lifetime. Wilfred Burchett, a Korean war correspondent, was one of them. Burchett hailed the constant efforts made by the President to develop the country's economy and improve the standard of people's living.  Industrial establishments and farms in the DPRK he visited were those associated with the relics of the President's on-the-spot guidance.
					
					 Burchett in his travelogue highly praised the President as the great leader who enjoyed absolute support and trust of the Korean people and wrote that the DPRK turned into a rich and powerful, independent and sovereign state under his wise leadership.
					
					 The undying feats the President performed for socialist construction in the DPRK and the cause of global independence will always be remembered in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind. The world is highly praising him.
					
					 The association will conduct positive activities for introducing the noble career and great contributions by the President who is revered by all people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Introduced by Lao Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Personality as Great Man Introduced by Lao Papers
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Lao papers gave wide publicity to the personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, as a great man.
					 Pasason on July 6 said Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the socialist cause of the Korean people. It went on:
					
					 He is another general secretary Kim Jong Il for the Korean people.
					
					 He has extraordinary intelligence and clairvoyant foresightedness.  He is possessed of profound knowledge about the politics, economy, culture, latest science and technology and various other fields.   Particularly, he who has qualifications and natural disposition as brilliant commander is well versed in not only all branches of arms and services and specialized field but latest military science and technology and all military equipment.
					
					 With distinguished organizing ability and outstanding practical caliber of skillfully mobilizing the masses, he is wisely leading the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving socialist nation while conducting all the work in a big and bold yet careful and meticulous manner. He is enjoying boundless love and reverence from the people as he cherishes deep obligation for comrades, ardent love for the people and boundlessly humble and informal traits.
					
					 His greatest mission is to carry forward and accomplish the ideas and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will inherit and accomplish the socialist cause generation after generation under his leadership.
					
					 Vatelao and Vientiane Mai carried similar articles on the same day.
